epd_metadata.c_pcr: c-PCR-003 (to 2019:14) Concrete and concrete elements, version 2023-01-02

applications: Jacking and shaft components of access chambers
product_description.technical_compliance: AS/NZS 4058:2007 - Precast concrete pipes (pressure and non-pressure)

lca_information.scope: Cradle-to-gate with options (A1-A3, A4, A5), modules C1-C4, and module D
lca_information.allocation: Mass-based for concrete products, economic for fly ash and steel slag
lca_information.cut_off_criteria: 1% of renewable and non-renewable primary energy usage, 1% of total mass input
key_assumptions: Concrete compositions from Humes internal systems
Use of EPDs from cement suppliers
Reinforcement steel modeled with ecoinvent data
lca_information.electricity: Adjusted AusLCI data representing estimated residual electricity grid mix in Australia
lca_information.declared_unit: 1 tonne of reinforced concrete pipe (RCP), including rubber rings, installed using the H1 bedding type

transport_to_site.average_distribution_distances: Weighted average delivery scenario for RCP products by site

processes: Placement and compaction of bedding materials

end_of_life.transport: Transportation to recycling site or disposal site
end_of_life.waste_processing: Crushing of waste pipes into concrete rubble and steel scrap
end_of_life.disposal: Emissions from concrete waste disposed to landfill considered

recycled_materials_handling.reuse_recovery_recycling_potential: Concrete rubble and steel scrap can replace natural coarse aggregates and virgin steel
recycled_materials_handling.module_d: Relevant when pipes are exhumed and recycled

additional_info.safety_health_environment: High environmental standards monitored by Holcim executive committee
